title: Google\Cloud\BigQuery\JobConfigurationTrait
name: JobConfigurationTrait
description: A utility trait implementing shared behavior between job configurations.

methods.name: dryRun
methods.description: Specifies the default dataset to use for unqualified table names in the query.

params.name: dryRun
params.description: Whether or not to execute as a dry run.

methods.name: jobIdPrefix
methods.description: Sets a prefix for the job ID.

params.name: jobIdPrefix
params.description: If provided, the job ID will be of format {$jobIdPrefix}-{jobId}.

methods.name: labels
methods.description: Specifies the default dataset to use for unqualified table names in the query.

methods.name: location
methods.description: Specifies the geographic location of the job. Required for jobs started outside of the US and EU regions.

params.name: location
params.description: The geographic location of the job. Defaults to a location specified in the client configuration, if provided, or through location metadata fetched by a network request (by calling Google\Cloud\BigQuery\Table::reload(), for example).
